entry.title: [Virtual Crisis: Frontier Trials] Crisis Trial Challenge Event
entry.content:
Tethys's crisis simulation program is getting an upgrade. With newly gathered data from the Black Shores and Rinascita, even harsher scenarios now await those who dare to face the challenge…

Duration

2025-06-19 10:00 - 2025-07-23 03:59 (server time)

Rewards

Astrite x500, Virtual Vanquisher (Title) x1, Premium Tuner x200, Advanced Resonance Potion x25, Advanced Sealed Tube x20, Shell Credit x500000, and other Materials.

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 30.

Event Rules

  • As a member of the Black Shores, take on Crisis Trial challenges and Disaster Trial high-difficulty challenges under various combinations of Stress Modules.

  • In Crisis Trials, select a Stress Level for each trial. The Stress Level must meet the requirements to complete the trial. Each trial has a default Stress Module. Support Modules are available to lower the trial's difficulty. After completing a Crisis Trial, the corresponding Disaster Trial along with its Stress Module and Support Module will be unlocked.

  • Disaster Trials have no required Stress Level. Participating in a Disaster Trial will consume Support Modules, so select them carefully in advance.

  • Obtain Matrix Crystals by achieving Challenge Objectives in the Crisis and Disaster Trials. Matrix Crystals can be exchanged for rewards at the Supply Station. The Supply Station closes when this event ends. Please exchange your Matrix Crystals in time.

  • Completing certain Stress Level challenges in Disaster Trials will grant an event-exclusive Title ""Virtual Vanquisher.""

Certain high-difficulty Stress Modules can only be unlocked after clearing a Disaster Trial. Warning: Equipping too many Stress Modules may make the trial excessively challenging.

If a participant is downed in a trial, they can consume Stress Levels to revive. This also gives a corresponding buff. Please note that consuming Stress Levels will affect the completion and final result of Challenge Goals.

entry.title: V2.4 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.

Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!

Content Requirement

Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.

We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!

How to Submit

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

Submission Period

2025/06/12 - 2025/07/17 (PT)

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.

Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.title: V2.4 WUWA Discord Quest Event is Now Live
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

V2.4 WUWA Discord Quest Event has begun. Click the link below to complete the quest on Discord and get a chance to win rewards including Astrite!

Event URL: <https://discord.com/quests/1380268980664533042>

Event Duration

June 12th - June 18th 16:59 (PT)

Rewards

Shell Credit* 20,000

Advanced Resonance Potion* 3

Advanced Energy Core* 3

Astrite* 30

Please note that the rewards are limited to 300,000 in total and will be given out on a first-come, first-served basis, determined by the time the Redemption Code is claimed after completing the quest. The Redemption Code will expire at 09:00 on September 11th (PT). The reward will be limited to one reward redemption per account.

Who is Eligible

Available to players on PC & PS5 where both Discord and Wuthering Waves are available. Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions.

Other Terms

Limit of one reward redemption per account. For more information on Discord Quests, please visit Discord Quest Help Center.

How to Participate

To complete the V2.4 WUWA Discord Quest on PC, players who meet the eligibility criteria must play Wuthering Waves while running the Discord desktop app simultaneously. If players who meet the eligibility criteria decide to complete the Quest on console, the Quest tracking will begin as long as your Discord account is connected via console. For guidance on how to connect and complete the Fortnite Quest on console, you can refer to the following:

Discord and PlayStation® Network Connection FAQ

Redemption Instructions

Once you have completed the Quest by playing 15 minutes of Wuthering Waves, you will receive a reward code in Quest Bar or Quest Home. For detailed instructions on how to claim your reward code, please refer to Discord Quests FAQ.

After claiming your reward code, please follow the steps below to redeem it in the game：

Select your server and enter Wuthering Waves, and then go to [Settings] - [Other] - [Redemption Code].

Enter the [Redemption Code] and hit [Confirm] to redeem rewards. You can then claim them in your in-game mail.

The [Redemption Code] function will be unlocked once you've reached Union Level 2.

The Redemption Code obtained in this event will expire on 2025/9/11 at 09:00 (PT). Redemption Codes that expire will be unable to be redeemed.

Discord Quest FAQ

Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can redeem on my Discord account?

A: Eligible users can redeem one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account.

For more information on Discord Quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center.

Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?

A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.

Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you are unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for Quests.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests.

A: We encourage you to review Discord's Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests.

Q: Why am I unable to complete Quest while using Linux?

A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices.

However, Discord team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows or MacOS.

Discord support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

entry.title: Patch Notes for Version 2.4: Lightly We Toss the Crown
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.4: Lightly We Toss the Crown.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-06-12 04:00 - 2025-06-12 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-06-12 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-06-12 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

[The Great Agon: Gifts of Grand Opening]

Log in to the game after version 2.4 goes live and claim the following rewards via in-game mail.

✦Rewards: Radiant Tide x10

✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 2 and unlock the Mails feature. The rewards will remain claimable via in-game mail until the next version update.

[Version Update Details]

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Cartethyia (Aero/Sword)

Cartethyia, the wandering knight who travels across Rinascita. Formerly known as the Blessed Maiden, the vessel of Divinity, and the Queen of Gale and Tide, she went by the name Fleurdelys. Now, she is simply a free and unfettered wandering knight.

Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Aero Erosion, DMG Amplification, Traction

Obtainable through the [Dance in the Storm's Wake] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Lupa (Fusion/Broadblade)

A Gladiator of Septimont, a radiant star of the arena.

Fiery and straightforward, Lupa lives like a wild lone wolf. As long as she can savor the adrenaline rush of battle, she doesn't mind if that same fire ends up consuming her whole.

Combat Roles: Concerto Efficiency, Resonance Liberation DMG, Basic Attack DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Roar of Triumph] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Defier's Thorn (Sword)

The surging tides force the crown of thorns upon the knight, out of which the knight forges this sword.

Unburdened by the crown, the knight waded through the roaring waves unwaveringly.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Defier's Thorn] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Wildfire Mark (Broadblade)

The young wolf races through the wilds, shedding every shadow that once held her back.

The lone wolf strides into the arena, cutting down each obstacle in her path.

She seizes victory. She claims glory. She raises everything she has high above. She belongs to the arena, but even more, she belongs to herself.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Wildfire Mark] Featured Weapon Convene.

New Region

[Septimont]

"All for glory, fear no death." Like Ragunna, Septimont is a city-state of Rinascita, though its people revere not Divinity, but heroes of flesh and blood.

Famed for its Gladiators, this City of Glory is hosting the Great Agon—a grand championship held once every four years.

Reach the location during Main Quest Chapter II Act V "Shadow of Glory."

[Septimont] New Way of Exploration

Slash: In Septimont, interact with a special mechanism to summon Hero's Legacy Armor to cut through roadblocks and venture into new areas.

[Septimont] New Way of Interation

Baths: Relax at the baths in Septimont, on your own or with other Resonators. You can invite up to 3 Resonators.

New Echoes

Lioness of Glory, Kerasaur, Pilgrim's Shell, Devotee's Flesh, Spectro Drake, Fusion Drake, Havoc Drake, Nightmare: Kelpie

New Sonata Sets: Windward Pilgrimage, Flaming Clawprint

Windward Pilgrimage (2pcs Set): Aero DMG + 10%

Windward Pilgrimage (5pcs Set): Hitting a target with Aero Erosion increases Crit. Rate by 10% and grants 30% Aero DMG Bonus, lasting for 10s.

Flaming Clawprint (2pcs Set): Fusion DMG + 10%.

Flaming Clawprint (5pcs Set): Casting Resonance Liberation increases Fusion DMG of Resonators in the team by 15% and the caster's Resonance Liberation DMG by 20%, lasting for 35s.

New Stories

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act V: Shadow of Glory

Cartethyia vanished in the Inverted Tower. Following the traces she left behind, you arrive at Septimont, one of Rinascita’s city-states, steeped in glory and famed for its gladiatorial tradition. The city is hosting the Great Agon—a grand championship held once every four years. Yet beneath the grandeur, shadows stir. Multiple factions move in secret, each with their hidden agenda. To uncover the truth, you form a temporary alliance with Contender Lupa. Together, you set your sights on the championship...

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.4 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier."

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act VI: Flames of Heart

You and Lupa claim the championship at the Great Agon. Later, the two of you follow the Lioness of Glory to the burial ground of the heroes and into a world of growing uncertainty. At the same time, you start to wonder if Lupa, your companion on this journey, is friend or foe.

Cheers sound distorted. Fate has been woven. You have a choice to make, and your choice will determine how the story ends.

  • Duration: Permanently available after 2025-07-03 10:00 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act V "Shadow of Glory."

※Chapter II Act V "Shadow of Glory" and Chapter II Act VI "Flames of Heart" will become available at different times. Please note that the availability of certain challenges, events, Trophies, and areas is tied to the Main Quest progress.

[Exploration Quests] Where Sky is Clear and Glory Shines

Hundreds of years ago, the Dark Tide reached the Border Mountains and Mournfell Canyon, burying them under Tidal Blight and erasing the glories they once enjoyed. Witnesses of the disaster remain, trapped in a high tower or confined in a cave, lamenting in nightmares that never end.

  • Eligibility: Explore specific areas of Septimont to unlock.

[Where Sky is Clear and Glory Shines] consists of three Exploration Quests, unlocked by exploring the Mournfell Canyon and Border Mountains in Septimont.

[Exploration Quest] Flames in the Deep

Legend tells of a lady clad in red and undying monsters in a pit where light can't reach. Flames burn. A promise is to be fullfilled.

  • Eligibility: Explore the Mournfell Canyon in Septimont to unlock.

New Events & Gameplay Features

[Special Events]

[Septimont] Area Events

Participate in Area Exploration Event "The Everglorious Summit" to explore the area and win rewards.

Participate in Featured Exploration Event "Septimont Travel Atlas" to increase Exploration Progress for the new region and win Astrites and Premium Tuners.

Participate in Photo Collection Event "Uncovering Past Heroes" to capture beautiful moments in Septimont.

  • Duration: Version 2.4 Update - 2025-07-23 03:59 (server time)

[All Out! Towards the Peaks of Prestige] Echo Combat Event

You can summon special Echoes from "Peaks of Prestige" to build your own deck and engage in thrilling duels across Septimont. Claim honor and fame while you rise to become the very first Apex Duelist of Septimont!

  • Duration: 2025-06-14 04:00 - 2025-07-23 11:59 (server time)

[Virtual Crisis: Frontier Trials] Crisis Trial Challenge Event

Tethys's crisis simulation program is getting an upgrade. With newly gathered data from the Black Shores and Rinascita, even harsher scenarios now await those who dare to face the challenge…

  • Duration: 2025-06-19 10:00 - 2025-07-23 03:59 (server time)

[Lollo Campaign: Verification] Featured Commission Event

The Lollo Campaign is facing an unexpected crisis! To save Maji's career, and to keep those convinent services running, help him verify the reliability of Lollo Campaign!

  • Duration: 2025-07-10 04:00 - 2025-07-23 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of Applause] 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.

  • Duration: Version 2.4 Update - 2025-07-23 03:59 (server time)

[New Gameplay Feature]

[Banners Never Fall] New Permanent Challenge Gameplay

With the intricate terrain of Septimont's Old District revealed after recent drainage efforts, the city has announced a thrilling new event—a simulated Tacet Discord Hunt. Brave Gladiators, step forward! Join the hunt and carve out your own path to glory and victory!

  • Availability: From 2025-07-03 10:00 (server time)

Other New Content

Tactical Hologram - Phantom Pain Challenge: Kelpie

Phantom Echoes: Phantom - Cuddle Wuddle, Phantom - Fae Ignis

Outfits: Laurel Nymph, Splashing Summer

Echo Aspects: Dawn upon Thorns (Glide), Dawn Upon Thorns (Flight), Moment of Triumph (Flight)

[Adjustments and Optimizations]

Enemies & Echoes

  • Adjusted enemy placement for the Rinascita - Whisperwind Haven area and the Rinascita - Averardo Vault area.

Features

**

Official Guide Depot**

New Feature: In-game Guide Depot

  • The official Guide Depot will become available in Version 2.4. Press the Guide Depot icon on the Terminal page to access this feature.

  • The Guide Depot offers guides on how to build Resonators efficiently. On the first page, you can get brief versions of the guides.

  • Press the avatar of a specific Resonator to access the corresponding guide, which gives recommendations on Echoes, upgrade priority, Resonance Chain nodes, weapons, teammates, and more.

  • If there are multiple guides for the same Resonator, you have the option of switching between them.

  • Moreover, you can judge how far along you have built a specific Resonator based on the stats recommended by the author of a particular guide.

Please note that data refreshes may be delayed.

**

Solaris New Voyage Celebration**

New Feature: Solaris New Voyage Celebration

  • Create a character profile after the Version 2.4 update and reach Union Level 5. The Solaris New Voyage Celebration unlocks once you meet the requirements. The event lasts 30 days.

  • The event has four types of tasks: Tidal Memories, Combat Scenes, Scenic Wonders, and Growth Roadmap. Complete these tasks to earn item rewards and Celebration Festivity Points.

  • Accumulate Festivity Points to unlock valuable rewards. Keep building it up to claim a standard 5-star Resonator of your choice!

  • When the Solaris New Voyage Celebration unlocks, the events "New Voyage Bundles" and "New Voyage Convene" will also unlock.

  • The events "New Voyage Bundles" and "New Voyage Convene" last as long as the Solaris New Voyage Celebration.

  • New Voyage Convene consists of New Voyage Companions: New Voyage Resonator Convene and New Voyage Arms: New Voyage Weapon Convene. During this event, you can select a Resonator/weapon from Versions 1.0 to 1.4 as your Convene target.

For more details about New Voyage Convene, please refer to the Convene page.

**

Main Quest Fast Track Event**

Adjustments to Next Stop: Rinascita

  • Adjusted the unlock conditions for this feature. Following the adjustment, you can unlock it by going to the Resonance Nexus in Jinzhou and unlocking the Terminal during Main Quest Chapter I Act I "First Resonance."

  • Gaining early access to Chapter II through Next Stop: Rinascita also unlocks Time Adjustment, Resonance Conversion functions, as well as some Utilities.

※Please note that due to the fact that gaining early access to Chapter II affects the unlock order of certain features, Lustrous Tide x1 will be sent to your Backpack following the Version 2.4 update.

**

Quest Tracking**

New Feature: Focus Mode

  • The Focus Mode option can be found on the page that provides information about a Main Quest selected via the Quests panel.

  • In Focus Mode, no Resonator or location will become unavailable as you progress through a quest, but other quests will be temporarily suspended.

Better Quest Tracking Experience

  • Added the "Do not show again" option when you use Fast Travel to travel to the nearest Resonance Beacon and track the target.

  • When you track a quest through the Quests menu and the tracked quest 50 meters or less from your current location, the Quests menu will close and you the quest location will be marked on screen.

  • When you click "Go" on a quest in the Quests menu, depending on how far away you are from the quest, either the Quests menu will close and the quest location will be marked on screen, or the Map will open.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

**

[Dreaming Deep] Solaris Film Festival**

Adjustments to Dreaming Deep

  • Increased the initial number of Dream Fragments for Dream Residue in Film Theory.

  • Increased the amount of ATK added by ATK Up I in Film Theory.

  • Increased the number of extra refreshes granted at the Recruitment Shop in Film Theory.

  • Increased the number of Team Levels added by Team Level Up I in Film Theory.

  • Decreased the levels of some enemies in Mt. Firmament Inn and Psyche Pass: The Outlier.

  • Set the number of Dream Fragments needed to refresh once at Recruitment Shop as 50 during the Recruitment Event in Solaris Film Festival.

  • Provided 1 initial refresh, before "Film Theory - Ally Recruitment I" is activated during the Recruitment Event in Solaris Film Festival.

  • Adjusted the designs of some icons.

  • Adjusted the enemy AI in certain Whimpering Wastes stages.

Controls

  • Added a slot to the Utility Wheel and adjusted the arrangement of the slots.

  • Added a slot to the Quick Access Wheel and adjusted the arrangement of the slots.

UI

**

Interactivity**

Better Interactivity

  • Colored symbols appear above some NPCs and functional objects when you are within a certain distance from them. Symbols for quest specific NPCs and objects are different in color from those for ordinary NPCs and objects.

  • When you are close enough, a symbol changes to let you know that you can interact with the associated NPC or object.

**

Store**

Adjustments to the UI design of Store

  • Added the new category "Aspects" to the Outfits section.

  • Adjusted the layout and presentation of the bundles in the Bundles section.

  • Adjusted the designs of the icons for some Special Offers bundles in the Bundles section.

  • Added a toggle option between the Convene page and the Ascendant Aces page.

  • Added Combat Features to the Trial Character page, allowing a quick glance into the combat mechanics of the Resonator in question.

  • Adjusted the presentation of Simulation Challenges, accessed via Guidebook > Recurring Challenges > Simulation Challenge; they are now grouped according to the regions in which they are found.

Graphics & Performance

**

Graphics Settings**

New Feature: Global Filter

  • Access the feature via Settings > Graphics > Global Filter on PC, PS5™, or Mac.

  • Six styles of Global Filter are available: Default, Vivid, Dystopian, Film, Noir, Wild. You may fine-tune the intensity and visual effects of the selected Global Filter.

  • Please note that cutscenes and UI elements will not be affected by the filter you select.

With a Global Filter applied, the screen may appear too bright or too dim under certain settings. Playing the game under such conditions for long periods of time may contribute to dry eye. Please keep this in mind while enjoying the game. We will continue to improve this feature in future versions.

New Graphics Quality option: Ultra Quality

To enable the Ultra Quality option, your device must meet the two requirements listed below:

  1. NVIDIA RTX 4080 or newer

  2. With a CPU capable of running 120 FPS

  • If your device meets the requirements, you can enable Ultra Quality via Settings > Graphics > Graphics Quality.

  • With this option enabled, some models will be shown in greater detail, distance ranges at which certain details are shown will be greater, the shadow quality will improve, and more lights will be displayed.

  • With this option enabled, models in some surroundings of Septimont will be shown in higher resolution, and the texturing quality will also improve.

  • Added the following effect on PC: Casting skills while in the water produces ripples on the surface.

  • Added the following effect on PC: Flying close to the water produces ripples and sprays on the surface.

  • Added the following effect on PC: Casting skills near fallen leaves in Septimont stirs the leaves.

  • Added the following effect on PC: In Septimont, the ground changes from dry to wet when it rains or wet to dry when it stops raining.

  • Extended the availability of the 120 FPS option to Mac devices equipped with the following chips: M3 Pro, M3 Max, M4, M4 Pro.

  • Extended the availability of the 90 FPS option to the following Android devices: RedMagic 10 Pro, RedMagic 10 Pro+, RedMagic 10S Pro, RedMagic 10S Pro+. Enable the 90 FPS option via Settings > Graphics > Frame Rate for a smoother gaming experience.

  • Adjusted the resolution settings on Mac (accessed via Settings > Graphics > Basic > Resolution). After Version 2.4 goes live, changes to the resolution within the game are not allowed in Full Screen mode. If you want to change the in-game resolution, please adjust the resolution of your device.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves x Twitch: Support a Streamer is now underway!
entry.content:
Wuthering Waves has once again partnered with Twitch to present the Wuthering Waves x Twitch: Support a streamer. Starting from June 12, 03:00 to June 18, 03:00 (PT), Twitch viewers will receive the "Clear Day" Gift Pack for gifting or buying 2 different tiers of Twitch subscriptions (Prime Subs are excluded) to any streamers within the Wuthering Waves category. The gift pack includes: Flight Aspect "Clear Day," Advanced Revival Inhaler x1, and Advanced Nutrient Block x1.

How to Participate

Step 1: Log in with your Twitch account

Step 2: Watch any livestream channel being conducted under the Wuthering Waves category on Twitch within the event duration

Step 3: Purchase or give away two different tiers of subscription on the above channel

SUPPORT A STREAMER Q&A

Q: In which regions will the Support a streamer event be available?

A: Players from all regions where both Wuthering Waves and Twitch provide services are eligible to participate in this event.

Q: How to confirm which channels meet the conditions of this campaign?

A: During the event, search for "Wuthering Waves" on Twitch and enter the "Wuthering Waves" category to locate the Twitch channel that is currently livestreaming under the Wuthering Waves category.

Q: How do I purchase a subscription on Twitch?

A: Users must first log into Twitch, using either a web browser or a mobile device. Purchases may be made on either a web browser or a mobile device. Detailed information on purchasing subscriptions can be found here, and information on purchasing gift subscriptions can be found here. If you have any other questions when completing your subscription purchase, please click here to contact the Twitch customer service team for support.

Q: Why have I not received rewards after subscribing to a streamer?

A: The campaign commences on June 12, 03:00, and concludes on June 18, 03:00 (PT). Subscriptions made before this period will not be eligible for rewards. Similarly, subscriptions made while the channel is not actively streaming Wuthering Waves under the designated category will not count towards the campaign. If you are unsure if your subscription was successful, please click here to confirm your purchase.

Q: Where can I locate my campaign rewards once earned?

A: Upon earning rewards, the campaign redemption code will be dispatched to the user's Twitch notification inbox within 24 hours. This inbox can be accessed via the top navigation bar on Twitch, situated to the right. The received codes will persist until manually deleted by the user. In addition, the redemption code can also be found on your Drops & Rewards Inventory page. If you still haven't received the redemption code 24 hours after successfully earning the reward, please click here to contact the Twitch customer service team for support.

Q: After receiving the rewards, how do I redeem them in the game?

A: Please follow these steps to claim your rewards:

  1. Select your server and enter the game, and then go to [Settings] - [Other] - [Redemption Code].

  2. Enter the [Redemption Code] and hit [Confirm] to redeem rewards.

  3. You can then claim them in your in-game mail.

  4. The [Redemption Code] function will be unlocked once you've reached Union Level 2.

  • The Redemption Code obtained in this event will expire on 2025-08-17 09:00 (PT). Redemption Codes that expire will be unable to be redeemed.

  • Should you encounter any issues, please contact Customer Service via the following email address:

wutheringwaves_ensupport@kurogames.com

Dear Rover,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.4: Lightly We Toss the Crown.

During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-06-12 04:00 - 2025-06-12 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-06-12 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

※In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

[How to Update]

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

✦PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

✦Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

✦iOS: Download/update the game in the App Store.

✦Mac: Download/update the game in the App Store.

✦PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update.

[Pre-download]

✦Start Time: 2025-06-10 10:00 (UTC+8)

[Pre-download Storage Requirements]

✦PC: 19 GB. To ensure smoother subsequent processes, such as decompressing, it is recommended that you have at least 38 GB of spare storage space on your PC.

✦Android/iOS: 11 GB. Approximately 22 GB of storage space is needed for the decompression process. This space will be used only temporarily and will be freed up once the maintenance is completed.

If your mobile device does not have enough spare storage space during the pre-download process or at its conclusion, merging, decompressing, or verifying files contained in the incremental resource package may fail, leading to the initiation of the downloading of the full resources. Please ensure that your mobile device has enough spare storage space. The full resources are larger in size (approximately 31 GB) and may take longer to download. The pre-download feature will be further optimized in future versions. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may experience in the meantime.

[How to Pre-download]

✦PC: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the resources.

✦Android/iOS: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, press the "Pre-download" button, either on the title screen after a successful login or on the in-game Terminal page, and confirm to pre-download the resources.

You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing on your mobile device or the PC launcher. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.

Please ensure that you have a stable network connection during the pre-downloading process.
